title: Textile, 1968-110-2, 1920–30
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Block-printed linen in shades of tan and yellow on a grey-blue background. Classical motifs: a half-draped female figure, in shades of tan, holds swagging floral garlands, stands on an elongated octagonal plaque-yellow, with basked of tan flowers in center. Figure stands under a draped canopy with tassels, supported by plant stalks. On top of canopy a large tan urn containing tan flowers. Vertical repeat of pattern incomplete. Pattern half-drop repeats on either side of central repeat, when matched side to side. Condition: soiled
